```{r}
#| label: packages and data
#| message: false

library(tidyverse) # general use package
library(lterdatasampler) # package of datasets

data(pie_crab) # crab size dataset 
```

```{r}
#| label: latitude and size plot

 # base layer: ggplot
ggplot(data = pie_crab, # dataset
       aes(x = latitude, # x-axis = latitude
           y = size)) + # y-axis = crab size
  geom_point() # points to represent individual points
```
